name: Slap Mania 2M
description:
This game was inspired by the first game I ever packaged and in UE4, called Slap Mania.

This is a game where you drive around in a city and hit people. "20 points for the pedestrian!" kind of thing. You can drift with the drift button, or dash forward to hit as many pedestrians as possible before the time is up. 

You can buy different cars with your High Scores. You can even turn on an option to show blood when you hit people.

There are 3 different modes: City Slap, Race Slap, and Square Slap. Each are different maps you can drive around to hit people.

You can adjust your handling in the settings. Each car has its own top speed.

Credits and Updates are in the Zipped folder.
